Summary: Harmar(ville): Strange morphing Triangle/Rectangle over Oakmont Country Club
divs: sighting details12:15am - i nicknamed this one the "flying choo choo" because of the lighting pattern from the side. same flight path e to w approximately as july 23rd sighting. coming from direction of pa turnpike over famous oakmont country club golf course as viewed across the river 2000 feet away. as you can see from the pictures, it changes shape like june 16th ufo that didn't show up on radar report. especially the 'tail' section (wish i could upload more pictures to show you-but limited to 3). ended up looking more like a flat rectangle as it when out of view across the allegheny river heading west or wsw. pretty low, i might add as there's a ridge on that side it would be low as it crossed it if going the same altitude. the 2 white lights close together (on tope) are similar to the other triangle ufos' middle light on ones i've filmed and so i think they are related (same manufacturer). hd video is uploaded to youtube on my channel: seeingufospa http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=d5nnuipkukw p.s. aaahhhhh! your sighting report still errors out when you pick 00 hours (midnight) for sighting time and you have to start all over again! fix it!
